introduction: Welcome to Recipe Muse, your personal culinary companion! This guide will help you get started with the app and make the most of its features.

installation.description: Recipe Muse is a single-file web application that runs entirely in your browser. No server, no installation, no dependencies required!
steps: Save the File: Download or save the recipe-app.html file to your computer
Open in Browser: Double-click the file or right-click and select 'Open with' ‚Üí your preferred browser
That's it! The app will load and you're ready to cook
supportedBrowsers: Any modern web browser with JavaScript enabled

coreFeatures.name: Dynamic Welcome Messages
coreFeatures.description: Every time you visit the home page, you'll be greeted with a different inspirational message!

coreFeatures.name: Personalized Experience
coreFeatures.description: Enter your first name, select your favorite cuisine from 27+ options worldwide, and get recipe recommendations tailored to your taste

coreFeatures.name: Smart Cuisine Search
coreFeatures.description: Type-ahead search functionality helps you find cuisines quickly
features: Click to select from the dropdown

coreFeatures.name: Recipe Recommendations
coreFeatures.description: Get detailed recipes including ingredients list, step-by-step instructions, timing information, and visual organization
includes: Timing information - Prep time, cook time, and servings

coreFeatures.name: Recipe Interactions
coreFeatures.description: Three ways to respond to each recipe

interactions.description: Get a different recipe from the same cuisine

coreFeatures.name: Favorites Collection
coreFeatures.description: Save unlimited recipes to your personal collection, view all favorites in a beautiful grid layout, quick access to saved recipes, and remove recipes you no longer need

steps.title: Arrive at the Home Page
steps.description: When you first open Recipe Muse, you'll see a colorful header with the app name, a unique welcome message (changes each visit!), and two navigation buttons: Home and Favorites

fields.name: First Name
fields.instruction: Type your first name in the text field. This personalizes your experience

fields.name: Favorite Cuisine
fields.instruction: Click in the 'Favorite Cuisine' field, start typing the name of your preferred cuisine, and select from the dropdown suggestions that appear

steps.title: Get Your Recipe
actions: Wait for the brief animation (‚ú® Crafting your perfect recipe...)

header: Recipe name in large, elegant font

options.description: Click to show you like the recipe. Button changes to '‚ù§Ô∏è Loved it!'. Visual feedback confirms your choice
Click if the recipe isn't what you want. Instantly generates a new recipe from the same cuisine. Keep clicking until you find the perfect match
Click to save the recipe to your favorites. Button turns orange and displays '‚≠ê Favorited'. Recipe is now permanently saved (until you remove it)

viewingFavorites.description: How to view your saved recipes
steps: Click the 'Favorites' button in the navigation bar
All saved recipes appear in a grid layout
Each card shows: Recipe name, Cuisine type, Prep and cook times

openingFavoriteRecipe.description: How to open and view a favorite recipe in detail
steps: Click on any recipe card in the Favorites page
You'll automatically return to the Home page
The full recipe details will be displayed
You can interact with it (like, dislike, or unfavorite)
Click 'Remove from favorites' link on any recipe card
Recipe is immediately removed from your collection
When viewing a favorited recipe on the Home page
Click the '‚≠ê Favorited' button to unfavorite it
The button changes back to '‚≠ê Add to Favorites'

dataPersistence.description: Your favorites are stored locally in your browser using localStorage
advantages: Favorites persist even after closing the browser
Data stays private on your device
limitations: Clearing browser data will delete your favorites
Favorites are device-specific (not synced across devices)

advice: Don't stick to one cuisine type
Each cuisine has multiple recipes in the database
Save recipes you want to try later
Mix different cuisines in your favorites
Refresh the page to see a new welcome message
Use the welcome messages as cooking inspiration
Come back daily for new quotes and haiku!
If you don't like a recipe, click 'Not for me'
You'll get a different recipe instantly
Keep exploring until you find the perfect dish
Bookmark the HTML file in your browser
Add it to your desktop for easy access
Open it whenever you need recipe inspiration

solutions: Make sure JavaScript is enabled in your browser
Check that the HTML file isn't corrupted
Make sure you're typing at least one character
Click directly in the input field
Try typing the full cuisine name and pressing Enter
Check if browser is in private/incognito mode (localStorage won't persist)
Ensure cookies and local storage are enabled
Try clearing browser cache and reloading
Make sure you filled in both fields (name and cuisine)
Select a cuisine from the dropdown suggestions
Refresh the page and try again
Hard refresh the page (Ctrl+F5 or Cmd+Shift+R)
Close and reopen the browser tab

Try the app in a different browser
